sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select count(case when etlinsertdate=etlmodifydate then etlpipelineid else null end) RowsInserted,
count(case when etlinsertdate<>etlmodifydate then etlpipelineid else null end) RowsUpdated
from @{pipeline().parameters.DestinationTable}
where etlpipelineid='@{pipeline().parameters.ETLPipelineID}'

activities.name: ExeExtractThirdEyePipeline
activities.description:
This runs from midnight to midnight on the day prior to ETLWindowsStart.
ETLWindowStartDay -1 day (the Day Prior) 00:00:00 to ETLWindowStartDay 00:00:00

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select top 5 AssetNumber 
FROM DW.Asset 
WHERE LEFT(AssetNumber,2) in ('20','08')

properties.description: ETL Parameters are Unused in the Sp. The are included only for ETL mg is moves the most recent locations within the last 60 minutes From Stage.ZonarPath to DW..FactCurrentActivity.
